name: The Great Fleece (Tempored Insanity Studio)
description:
The Great Fleece is a stealth-based, top-down 3D game where you play as Darren, a thief who plans to infiltrate the Beatrice Auction House and raid the vault filled with valuables.

  • Left Click - Move to clicked point.
  • Right-Click - Toss a coin (if available) at the clicked point to distract guards.

This is the second game project I've made during my current GameDevHQ course, and is based on their project guidelines. Therefore it does look very similar to all the other "The Great Fleece" projects on Itch, however, I have tried to add some new features and improvements to make it a bit different.

I hope you enjoy it!
